description: This file is the main HTML page for a database visualization web application, providing the UI structure, styles, and embedded JavaScript code for fetching and displaying database, table, and data information.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by re-fetching the data from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database section and loads its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders HTML table from data array.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates a table cell HTML with special handling for long text and JSON objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands/collapses a table cell to show full content.
